page.title: 11Entertainment: Gilford
page.content: In Gilford there is no theatre, opera, cinema or music hall. In the G.C.C. hall they have discos, dancing, bingo and parties. At the disco they put on the flash-lights and they have coke and crisps. They have dances in the hall for pensioners and they enjoy it. Sometimes they have outings for pensioners to the beach or somewhere like that. At Christmas they have parties in the G.C.C. hall for children and adults. They have films and dances for the children. some of the children enjoy it because they get sweets and crisps and lemonade. The G.C.C. hall is used for many things like meetings and Youth Clubs. Every Thursday the girls go to the Youth Club for a bit of sport. Some of the girls have to bring a pair of roller boots to skate around on.
